gwt.g2d.client.graphics
Class DirectShapeRenderer

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.graphics.DirectShapeRenderer

public class DirectShapeRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

Interface for manipulating the Surface's path drawing directly. This class is very similar to ShapeBuilder except this class will draw to the canvas directly, whereas ShapeBuilder stores the drawing commands internally. This call may be used in favor of ShapeBuilder when the shapes are very complex or when new custom shape are to be drawn in high frequency.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com
